channel.title: Shop problem!
channel.description:
look im good at coding and all but shops kill me look at whats happened. i mean ive done it all right and ill heres the codes to prove it to you. NOTE: this is just my test shop. shop.cfg [code]shop = 41 SANTA_OWNZ_U 1 1 1702 10000 [/code]
autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 3166 3246 3432 0 0 0 0 0 1 Mike[/code]
and lastly client.java [code]} else if (NPCID == 3166) { //SANTA OWNZ U PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41;[/code]
this is the problem i think. heres my server runner: [code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -67 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:14213) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13209) at client.process(client.java:13179) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45) Game saved for player mod jerry ClientHandler: Client mod jerry disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1520 Client type: low memory version UserId: 98158628 mod jerry has signed onto server. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -67 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:14213) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13209) at client.process(client.java:13179) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45)[/code]

item.title: Shop problem!
item.dc:creator: @karuto karuto
item.description:
@karuto wrote:

i did.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2007, 04:16:01 PM[/size][hr]it still says this I even took one of the ones copied it and didnt change anything cept the npc.

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -67 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:14212) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13208) at client.process(client.java:13178) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45)

Read full topic
